com.iciql
Class DbInspector

java.lang.Object
  com.iciql.DbInspector

public class DbInspector
extends java.lang.Object

Class to inspect a model and a database for the purposes of model validation and automatic model generation. This class finds the available schemas and tables and serves as the entry point for model generation and validation.

Method Detail

setPreferredDateTimeClass

public void setPreferredDateTimeClass(java.lang.Class<? extends java.util.Date> dateTimeClass)
Set the preferred class to store date and time. Possible values are: java.util.Date (default) and java.sql.Timestamp.

Parameters:
dateTimeClass - the new class

generateModel

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateModel(java.lang.String schema,
                                                      java.lang.String table,
                                                      java.lang.String packageName,
                                                      boolean annotateSchema,
                                                      boolean trimStrings)
Generates models class skeletons for schemas and tables. If the table name is undefined, models will be generated for every table within the specified schema. Additionally, if no schema is defined, models will be generated for all schemas and all tables.

Parameters:
schema - the schema name (optional)
table - the table name (optional)
packageName - the package name (optional)
annotateSchema - (includes schema name in annotation)
trimStrings - (trims strings to maxLength of column)
Returns:
a list of complete model classes as strings, each element a class

validateModel

public <T> java.util.List<ValidationRemark> validateModel(T model,
                                                          boolean throwOnError)
Validates a model.

Parameters:
model - an instance of the model class
throwOnError - if errors should cause validation to fail
Returns:
a list of validation remarks
